title: A Glittering song
creator_credit: Praha Loutkovy Film and Short Film Studio
brief_description: An animated children’s film in which bits of coloured glass and graphic art appear, change, and shift in an endless variety of patterns. This live action documentary technique creates a fantasy world of colour, light and form with a slight thread of story involving a child.
